description.value:
One of your ancestors was fey, or the fey realm somehow intermixed with your bloodline. It affects your bloodrage in tricky and surprising ways.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{Combat Reflexes}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Dodge}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{Lightning Reflexes}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{Mobility}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Mz8ZG6nqW3NKFZhK]{Step Up}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0jbkTJcIji9BNiF]{Intimidating Prowess}

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2nn2tshkn4p7k25l]{Entangle} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{Hideous Laughter} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{Haste} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{Confusion} (16th)
